color.description: The color of the icon when selected

icon.description: The icon style when the entire icon is selected
icon.type: 选中整个图标时的图标样式
icon.description_zh: 选中整个图标时的图标样式

empty-color.description: The color of the icon when it is unchecked

empty-icon.description: The style of the icon when unchecked

size.description: Icon size, default unit is px
size.type: 图标大小，默认单位为 px
size.description_zh: 图标大小，默认单位为 px

gap.description: Icon interval, default unit is px
gap.type: 图标间隔，默认单位为 px
gap.description_zh: 图标间隔，默认单位为 px

half.description: Whether or not to allow half selection

half-icon.description: The style of the icon when half-selected is only valid if 'half' is 'true'
half-icon.type: 半选时图标的样式，只有在 half 为 true 时才有效
half-icon.description_zh: 半选时图标的样式，只有在 `half` 为 `true` 时才有效

namespace.description: A namespace for icons that can be extended with a library of custom icons
namespace.type: 图标的命名空间, 可扩展自定义图标库
namespace.description_zh: 图标的命名空间, 可扩展自定义图标库

disabled-color.description: Disable the color of the icon when grading, only valid if 'disabled' is 'true', and take precedence over 'color', 'empty-color'
disabled-color.type: 禁止评分时图标的颜色，只有在 disabled 为 true 时才有效，优先级高于 color、empty-color
disabled-color.description_zh: 禁止评分时图标的颜色，只有在 `disabled` 为 `true` 时才有效，优先级高于 `color`、`empty-color`

clearable.description: Whether or not to allow emptying

ripple.description: Whether or not to use water ripples

rules.description: Validation rules, which return 'true' to indicate that the validation is passed, and the rest of the values are converted to text as user prompts
rules.type: 验证规则，返回 true 表示验证通过，其余的值则转换为文本作为用户提示
rules.description_zh: 验证规则，返回 `true` 表示验证通过，其余的值则转换为文本作为用户提示
